Heya!

Just to let you know I am waiting on Sandy to reply before I move
forward with Rodimus as Tuscon is pretty much their commander now for
the moment. I know we all have real lives, so this is not meant as a
push as much as a reason why I haven't posted much for Rodimus in the
past day or so. :)

Kraftlos, if you want to jump in on this band wagon feel free to do
so. I would so much enjoy having your character's input in all of
this. With Rodimus being back, and Tuscon having assumed Prime status,
this is almost a new beginning for the Maximal and Autobot side, as
well as a revamping of Hydras' faction as well. I can see so many
things bouncing off of this for both sides, and not just combat -
character growth, factions merging - there are so many things.

And oh yes, don't forget the Unicronians are still out there! I have
been keeping them low key since there is so much going on with the
Primes. But they will be making a noise soon. heh heh heh >:-)

I have been watching old Transformers Animated episodes, and after the
old 80's cartoon I think they are excellent, and have given me much
food for thought - not sure if that is a good thing or bad :)

Anyways, game on!

Preston
